title: wine_Piña_2007_Buckeye_Vineyard_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Howell_Mountain)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 127581.
country: US.
description: Piña has a spectacular record with this wine, and indeed with all their Cabs from Howell Mountain. The '07 is notable for its superb structure. It has pristine tannins and a good, dry mouthfeel, with very rich flavors of blackberries, currants, chocolate and cedar that are grounded with notes of anise and sweet herbs. Very fine and dramatic, this 100% Cab should develop for at least the next eight years..
designation: Buckeye Vineyard.
